analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x661cb74e2f44528bdfe11170c551debcb4b264ac.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/37/0x661cb74e2f44528bdfe11170c551debcb4b264ac.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x661cb74e2f44528bdfe11170c551debcb4b264ac.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
